title: Longmont media veteran launches AI news site, but is it just 'a news-shaped object'?
description: Scott Converse has spent years launching and experimenting with local news projects, driven in part by his dissatisfaction with the state of local journalism. The longtime local media and technology figure's latest project, Longmont News Network, uses artificial intelligence to generate stories about civic affairs in Longmont.
